info.title: Tracking-API
info.description:
This API allows client-side software to track specific as well as generic events.

# Authentication

<!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

500.description:
Internal Server Error

+ Most probably due to an error when contacting the Hubspot-API

source.description: The device on which the event occured (e.g. "mobile" or "web-app")

tracking_type.description: The descriptor of the occured event which selects/names the Hubspot Contact-List to which the user will be added.

post.description: Moves the calling user into a Hubspot Contact List of the same name as the request's `tracking_type` parameter

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided
+ Invalid Hubspot-API Key provided

404.description:
Not Found

+ If property `property_name` does not exist in Hubspot

500.description:
Internal Server Error

+ Hubspot API Internal Server Error

post.description:
Sets the passed property to the given value.

**Note:** In case of `date_value` only timestamps at exactly midnight (UTC) are accepted.

date_value.description: Must by Unix timestamp in milliseconds

datetime_value.description: Must be Unix timestamp in milliseconds

200.description:
OK

+ Unmodified response of Hubspot API: 
`GET /contacts/v1/contact/email/:contact_email/profile`

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

get.description: Returns Hubspot API contact properties of user

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

get.description: Returns general information about the authenticated user

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

get.description: Returns all publicly visible permissions

get.summary: List all of the client's users

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

get.description:
**Requires `management` account**

Returns a list of all user accounts belonging to the client

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token
+ No token

403.description:
Forbidden

Multiple reasons possible:

+ Email address references user-account of another client
+ Calling user does not have a management account

500.description:
Internal Server Error

+ Setting global permissions was unsuccessful

put.description:
**Requires `management` account**

Adds the provided set of permissions to the specified user's global permission

post.summary: Log in with email and password

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Provided credentials are not correct

post.description: Log an user in with the provided email/password combination

post.summary: Associate a smartphone with a user

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

500.description:
Internal Server Error

+ Token could not be saved to database

post.description: Identifies a user's mobile device and installed Mozaik app as such with a firebase token

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

403.description:
Forbidden

+ Project's client does not match the user's client
+ Logo does not match client
+ Project is deactivated
+ Project is locked
+ Missing template step video selection for project

500.description:
Internal Server Error

+ DV config data not found
+ Error in video generation

project_id.description: Project to generate a video for

logo_id.description: Logo to use for this generation

color.description: Color to use for this video

text_inputs.description: Array of template steps which require text inputs

inputs.description: Array of all text inputs for the template step

post.description: Requests DV-API to generate new video

post.summary: Connect secret to current user and project

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

403.description:
Forbidden

+ Project's client does not match the user's client
+ Project is deactivated
+ QR-Code already used

project_id.description: The project to which to connect the secret

secret.description: The secret value to which to connect the project

post.description: Associates a secret value (rendered as a QR code) with an authenticated user and the current project in the mobile app.

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

post.description: Stores the provided image file in the backend

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided

+ Project is deactivated

requestBody.description: Provides a manually filmed video for a specific template step of an active project

post.description: Provides a manually filmed video for a specific template step of an active project.

get.description: This is just a simple function which gives the information that the server is running. No token required

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

403.description:
Forbidden

+ Logo does not belong to client
+ Video does not belong to client

parameters.description: Request a previously uploaded video file

Provides download functionality for files stored on FTP-server

Important: Use only one of the possible query parameters

post.description: Logs a client-side error

usercode.description: Dynamic Video id for the video generation request

post.description: Triggers the fetching of data for the generated video of a project and subsequent notifications to end users

get.summary: Generate a new secret to encode as a QR code

secret.description: Secret value to encode in QR code

get.description: Creates a new secret value which can be associated with an authenticated user

400.description:
Bad Request

+ Secret does not exist in database

403.description:
Unauthorized

+ Project is deactivated

424.description:
Failed Dependency

+ Secret has not yet been connected to any project

post.description:
**Requires secret to be associated with an user and project**

Returns auth-token of the user associated with the provided secret and their current project

get.summary: Show all support-messages sent and received

contact_name.description: Name of the support team member the user corresponds with

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

get.description:
Returns the current support team contact and an array of exchanged messages

__Optionally:__ Return no messages sent earlier than the message specified in the optional query parameter

If no support chat has yet been initiated, `null` is returned.

parameters.name: earliest_message_id
parameters.description: Only return messages sent after this one

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token
+ No token

post.description: Marks the passed message and all sent earlier as read (sets their received `timestamp` to now)

newest_known_mesage_id.description: ID of the newest message that the client application knows of

post.summary: Send a message to the support

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

503.description:
Service Unavailable

+ If message could not be sent

post.description: Sends a message to the support team and returns the created message object

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

get.description: List the current user's assigned roles that determine which functionalities of the admin API they can access

role_added.description: Name of the removed company role

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token
+ No token

patch.description: Assign the passed role to the calling company user

role_removed.description: Name of the removed company role

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token
+ No token

403.description:
Forbidden

+ If a preqrequisite for the removal of the specified role has not (yet) been met

company_role.description: Role that was meant to be removed

error_message.description: Reason why role could not be removed

delete.description:
Remove the passed role from the calling user's set of assigned ones.
May fail due to role-specific restrictions.

get.summary: Get a single support chat thread

400.description:
Bad Request

+ If the support team member has no active thread with the specified user
+ If the specified message does not belong to the specified thread

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

get.description:
__Requires role `support`__

Get all exchanged support chat messages with the given user and general information about them.

__Optionally:__ Return no messages sent earlier than the message specified in the optional query parameter

__Important:__ Only possible if the referenced user has an active thread with the current support team member

parameters.name: earliest_message_id
parameters.description: Only return messages sent after this one

400.description:
Bad Request

+ If the passed message id does not exist or belong to the specified thread
+ If the current support team member has no active thread with the specified user

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

newest_known_mesage_id.description: ID of the newest message that the client application knows of

post.description:
__Requires role `support`__

Mark all messages from the user sent earlier than the one passed in the request body (included) as received (sets their `timestamp` value)

__Important:__ Only possible if the referenced user has an active thread with the current support team member

post.summary: Send a message to a user

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

403.description:
Forbidden

+ If the specified user has already an active thread with another support team member

post.description:
__Requires role `support`__

Sends a message to a specific user

__Important:__ Only possible if there is no active thread including this user and another support team member

get.summary: List all active support chat threads

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

get.description:
__Requires role `support`__

Get a list of all support chat threads that the current user has, identifieable by the eacht thread's contact user

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

403.description:
Forbidden

+ If the specified user's registration e-mail address does not end with `...@dynamic-video.de`

post.description:
Promotes an existing user to company user status.
Requires the referenced user to be registered under a `...@dynamic-video.de` E-Mail

post.summary: Archive an active support chat thread

401.description:
Unauthorized

+ Invalid token provided
+ No token provided

403.description:
Forbidden

+ If the calling support user is not the assigned support user of the referenced user

post.description: Archives all messages from an active support thread with the passed user and resets their assigned support user

user_id.description: Id of the user for which to archive the support chat

speaking.description: Whether the template requires spoken content

in_categories.description: Array of category ids to which this template belongs to

template_steps.description: All template steps that are required for this template

hash.description: Hash of all template parameters, except for itself

step_number.description: This template step's place in the ordered set of all this template's template steps

explanation.description: Explanations for the template step's expected content

camera_advice.description: Advice on what and how to film

frame.description: Which frame to overlay while in camera view

min_duration.description: Minimum required length of the manually filmed video

max_duration.description: Maximum required length of the manually filmed video

text_input_fields.description: Array of all text input fields available for this template step

sequence_number.description: This field's place in the ordered set of this template step's text input fields

max_input_length.description: Maximum allowed number of characters for this field

text_input_advice.description: Advice on what to write in this field

set_flags.description: All flags that have been set for this project

video_inputs.description: Array of all template steps requiring user-generated videos

available.description: Whether a video for this template step has already been uploaded

videos.description: If available, the id of the newest uploaded video for this template step

url.description: URL under which this video is publically accessible

id.description: Null, if messages from the user have not yet been assigned to a receiver

direction.description: Either "receieved" or "sent" from the calling user's perspective

received.description: Timestamp of receiption if already received

assigned.description: Whether the user has already been assigned to a support-user
